name: A Very Derivative Undertale Fan Game
name_original: A Very Derivative Undertale Fan Game
description:
In 2017 I entered a contest on /r/Unitale to create an Undertale battle with the worst possible control scheme. I won. Learn some maths with A Very Derivative Undertale Fan Game, a mod for Create Your Frisk.

To play copy the mod files into the latest Create Your Frisk release and select it from the mod selection screen.

The menus control like in Undertale: Arrow keys, Z and X. In battle use your mouse to control the sliders.
